## tempCompiler() function

简单的模板解析

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function tempCompiler<T extends object>(temp: string, data: T): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  temp | string | 模板 |
|  data | T | 数据对象 |

**Returns:**

string

## Example


```ts
 const temp = '<div>name: ${name}, score: ${score()}, pass: ${pass ? "yes" : "no"}</div>'
 const data = {
   name: 'Jack',
   score(){
     return 59
   },
   pass: false
 }
 console.log(tempCompiler(temp, data)) // "<div>name: Jack, score: 59, pass: no</div>"
```
